mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pogg_report_subtotal (address, owner_address, miner_type, epoch, record_num, total_energy_generation, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{address}, #{ownerAddress}, #{minerType}, #{epoch}, #{recordNum},#{totalEnergyGeneration}, #{createTime}, #{createTime})
